title: The Use Declaration
description: In this lab, we will explore the use declaration in Rust, which allows us to bind a full path to a new name for easier access, and can be used with the as keyword to bind imports to a different name. Example code snippets demonstrate how to use the use declaration to simplify accessing functions and modules within nested paths.

meta.title: Mastering the Rust Use Declaration
meta.description: Explore the power of the Rust use declaration to simplify access to functions and modules within nested paths.
meta.keywords: rust playground, coding, rust online compiler, rust tutor, rust commands, rust practice, rust online playground, rust online, nested paths, programming
